decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 234401FUL dated 21/12/2023 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments with approved plans referenced: E001 Existing Plans, E002 Existing Elevations, E003 Existing Side Elevations, E004 Existing Section, P001 REV D PROPOSED Floor Plan, P002 REV D FRONT AND REAR ELEVATIONS, P003 REV D PROPOSED Elevations, P004 REV D PROPOSED Section A-A

, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes to the ground floor design, in relation to planning permission reference 234401FUL dated 21/12/2023 for 'Conversion of single family dwellinghouse into 2 self-contained flats; single storey rear/side extension; rear roof extension to main roofslope; roof extension to rear outrigger; and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope  '
